languages.text: {n}Бирюзовые глаза превращаются в две щелки, в которых плещется издевка.{/n} "Ты сам{mf||а} хотел{mf||а} развлечений — и позвал{mf||а} меня. Чего еще ты ожидал{mf||а}? Впрочем, не отвечай — мне неинтересно. Пожалуй, вернусь к тому, от чего ты меня столь бестактно оторвал{mf||а}".

{n}Marazhai's mocking eyes narrow into slits.{/n} "You wanted entertainment, so you called me. What else did you expect? On second thought, save your answer — I do not care. I will now return to what I was doing before I was so rudely interrupted."
languages.original_text: {n}Бирюзовые глаза превращаются в две щелки, в которых плещется издевка.{/n} "Ты сам{mf||а} хотел{mf||а} развлечений — и позвал{mf||а} меня. Чего еще ты ожидал{mf||а}? Впрочем, не отвечай — мне неинтересно. Пожалуй, вернусь к тому, от чего ты меня столь бестактно оторвал{mf||а}".

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow into slits, brimming with mockery.{/n} "You wanted entertainment, so you called me. What else did you expect? On second thought, save your answer — I do not care. It is time I returned to my business that I was so boorishly interrupted from minding."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai's eyes narrow into slits, brimming with mockery.{/n} "You wanted entertainment, so you called me. What else did you expect? On second thought, save your answer — I do not care. It is time I returned to my business that I was so boorishly interrupted from minding."

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai plisse ses yeux moqueurs.{/n} « Vous m'avez demandé de vous divertir. À quoi vous attendiez-vous, venant de moi ? Réflexion faite, inutile de répondre. Je m'en moque et je vais retourner à mes occupations que vous avez si grossièrement interrompues. »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mocking eyes narrow into slits.{/n} "You wanted entertainment, so you called me. What else did you expect? On second thought, save your answer — I do not care. I will now return to what I was doing before I was so rudely interrupted."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai plisse ses yeux moqueurs.{/n} « Vous m'avez demandé de vous divertir. À quoi vous attendiez-vous, venant de moi ? Réflexion faite, inutile de répondre. Je m'en moque et je vais retourner à mes occupations que vous avez si grossièrement interrompues. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai entrecierra sus ojos burlones.{/n} «Querías entretenimiento, así que me has llamado. ¿Qué esperabas? Mejor pensado, no respondas; no me interesa. Volveré a lo que estaba haciendo antes de esta interrupción tan grosera».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mocking eyes narrow into slits.{/n} "You wanted entertainment, so you called me. What else did you expect? On second thought, save your answer — I do not care. I will now return to what I was doing before I was so rudely interrupted."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai entrecierra sus ojos burlones.{/n} «Querías entretenimiento, así que me has llamado. ¿Qué esperabas? Mejor pensado, no respondas; no me interesa. Volveré a lo que estaba haciendo antes de esta interrupción tan grosera».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋将眼睛眯成两条缝，露出了嘲弄的表情。{/n}“你渴望娱乐，所以你把我叫了过来，那你还在期待别的什么呢？算了，不用告诉我答案，反正我也不感兴趣。你粗鲁地打断了我，现在，我要回去做之前在做的事情了。”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mocking eyes narrow into slits.{/n} "You wanted entertainment, so you called me. What else did you expect? On second thought, save your answer — I do not care. I will now return to what I was doing before I was so rudely interrupted."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋将眼睛眯成两条缝，露出了嘲弄的表情。{/n}“你渴望娱乐，所以你把我叫了过来，那你还在期待别的什么呢？算了，不用告诉我答案，反正我也不感兴趣。你粗鲁地打断了我，现在，我要回去做之前在做的事情了。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは嘲笑うように目を細めた。{/n}「エンターテイメントが欲しくて私を呼んだんでしょう。他に何を期待したんだ？考え直したよ。やっぱり、答えはいらない。どうでもいいからな。これから、無礼にも邪魔された問題より前の行動に戻ろうと思う」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mocking eyes narrow into slits.{/n} "You wanted entertainment, so you called me. What else did you expect? On second thought, save your answer — I do not care. I will now return to what I was doing before I was so rudely interrupted."

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは嘲笑うように目を細めた。{/n}「エンターテイメントが欲しくて私を呼んだんでしょう。他に何を期待したんだ？考え直したよ。やっぱり、答えはいらない。どうでもいいからな。これから、無礼にも邪魔された問題より前の行動に戻ろうと思う」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhais spöttische Augen verengen sich zu Schlitzen.{/n} "Ihr wolltet Unterhaltung, also habt Ihr mich gerufen. Was habt Ihr denn erwartet? Wobei, spart Euch Eure Antwort, es schert mich nicht. Ich setze nun wieder fort, womit ich beschäftigt war, ehe ich so rüde unterbrochen wurde."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mocking eyes narrow into slits.{/n} "You wanted entertainment, so you called me. What else did you expect? On second thought, save your answer — I do not care. I will now return to what I was doing before I was so rudely interrupted."

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhais spöttische Augen verengen sich zu Schlitzen.{/n} "Ihr wolltet Unterhaltung, also habt Ihr mich gerufen. Was habt Ihr denn erwartet? Wobei, spart Euch Eure Antwort, es schert mich nicht. Ich setze nun wieder fort, womit ich beschäftigt war, ehe ich so rüde unterbrochen wurde."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai'ın alaycı gözleri kısılıp birer çizgi hâlini alıyor.{/n} "Eğlence istediğin için beni çağırdın. Başka ne bekliyordun? Tekrar düşündüm de yanıtını kendine sakla, umurumda değil. Şimdi kabaca müdahale edilmeden önce yaptığım şeylere geri döneyim."
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai's mocking eyes narrow into slits.{/n} "You wanted entertainment, so you called me. What else did you expect? On second thought, save your answer — I do not care. I will now return to what I was doing before I was so rudely interrupted."
